ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId), OR( AND(Account.RecordType.Id = '0120Y000000VZN3', RecordTypeId != '0120Y000000R2Nx'), AND(Account.RecordType.Id = '0120Y000000VZN5', RecordTypeId != '0120Y000000R2Ny'), AND(Account.RecordType.Id = '0120Y000000VZN4', RecordTypeId != '0121v000000FuqC'), AND(Account.RecordType.Id = '0120Y0000002q3M', RecordTypeId != '0121v000000FuqH'), AND(Account.RecordType.Id = '0121v000000NSGe', RecordTypeId != '0121v000000NRvO')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Contact Record Type does not fit to the Account Record Type. Please review the Contact.
